typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	Param_DataFlow1 as string ('Param_DataFlow1')
}
source(output(
		ValDate as string,
		UpdateGroup as string,
		GDSKey as string,
		CompareTo as string,
		Source1 as string,
		Source2 as string,
		Source3 as string,
		Source4 as string,
		Application as string,
		GroupID as string,
		Entity as string,
		FundGroup as string,
		Fund as string,
		SubFund as string,
		FundType as string,
		Basis as string,
		StressGroup as string,
		StressName as string,
		StressID as string,
		ReinsLayer as string,
		Country as string,
		ProductGroup1 as string,
		ProductGroup2 as string,
		PlanEnhance as string,
		RepName1 as string,
		RepName2 as string,
		RepName3 as string,
		ItemName1 as string,
		ItemName2 as string,
		ItemName3 as string,
		ItemName4 as string,
		ItemName5 as string,
		ItemName6 as string,
		ItemName7 as string,
		ItemName8 as string,
		ItemName9 as string,
		ItemName10 as string,
		ItemOrd1 as string,
		ItemOrd2 as string,
		ItemOrd3 as string,
		ItemOrd4 as string,
		ItemOrd5 as string,
		ItemOrd6 as string,
		ItemOrd7 as string,
		ItemOrd8 as string,
		ItemOrd9 as string,
		ItemOrd10 as string,
		ItemDesc1 as string,
		ItemDesc2 as string,
		ItemDesc3 as string,
		ItemDesc4 as string,
		ItemDesc5 as string,
		ItemDesc6 as string,
		ItemDesc7 as string,
		ItemDesc8 as string,
		ItemDesc9 as string,
		ItemDesc10 as string,
		ValueN01 as string,
		ValueN02 as string,
		ValueN03 as string,
		ValueN04 as string,
		ValueN05 as string,
		ValueN06 as string,
		ValueN07 as string,
		ValueN08 as string,
		ValueN09 as string,
		ValueN10 as string,
		ValueS01 as string,
		ValueS02 as string,
		ValueS03 as string,
		ValueS04 as string,
		ValueS05 as string,
		Residual as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	dateFormats: ['dd/MM/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['yyyy.MM.dd HH:mm:ss'],
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'double') ~> inTrueUpCalc010
inTrueUpCalc010 derive(ItemOrd1 = toInteger(ItemOrd1),
		ItemOrd2 = toInteger(ItemOrd2),
		ItemOrd3 = toInteger(ItemOrd3),
		ValueN03 = toDouble(ValueN03),
		ValueN04 = toDouble(ValueN04),
		Residual = toDouble(replace(Residual, ',', '')),
		ValueN01 = toDouble(ValueN01),
		ValueN02 = toDouble(ValueN02)) ~> ItemOrdToInt
ItemOrdToInt aggregate(groupBy(Application,
		Basis,
		Fund),
	ValueN03 = sum(ValueN03),
		ValueN04 = avg(ValueN04),
		Residual = sum(Residual),
		MaxValueN01 = max(ValueN01),
		MinValueN02 = min(ValueN02),
		FirstItemOrd1 = first(ItemOrd1),
		LastItemOrd1 = last(ItemOrd1)) ~> TrueUpCalc020
DerivedColumn1 unpivot(output(
		Fund as string,
		Residual as double
	),
	ungroupBy(Application,
		Basis),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true) ~> Unpivot1
Pivot2 derive(CIS = case(isNull(CIS), toDouble(0), CIS)) ~> DerivedColumn1
TrueUpCalc020 pivot(groupBy(Application,
		Basis),
	pivotBy(Fund, ['PLAL', 'RLM', 'UFIB', 'NA', 'CIS']),
	{} = sum(Residual),
	columnNaming: '$V$N',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot2
Unpivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['outTrueUp'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
